meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>woman</kanji> who is also a <kanji>god</kanji> is a <vocabulary>goddess</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic:
The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You haven't learned this reading for 女 yet so here's a mnemonic to help you:

This <vocabulary>goddess</vocabulary> has the most beautiful <reading>目</reading> (め) you've ever seen. You can't stop staring into them. This must be how people know they've met a god.
